reviewText: You must get this DVD if you want to know what is going on in our world, and know where we are headed.  Joel Rosenberg knows what is going on in the Middle East and what it means, and this video will help you to understand.  It is exciting too, because it is major earth-shaking events that are not fiction, but real.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Epicenter DVD: A Video DocumentaryThis DVD is surprisingly current even though it was made several years ago.  People mentioned and interviewed in this dvd, like the current Israeli leader, and the current Iranian leader are still in power or have just regained power.  This DVD is worth watching even if you find Biblical Prophecy tricky or hard to follow because the political events covered are still going on.  A great way to learn about the Middle East through "the third lens" of the Bible.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I really like Rosenberg's writing so I got this not knowing what to expect. He has interviewed Netenyahu and former terrorists and it is very interesting information. How you process it is up to you, but Rosenberg believes in helping the nation of Israel.

reviewText: For Christians and Jews this is a must see DVD. There is just a feeling in the air that these days are close at hand.
